entry.title: TEMPUR-FIT Mattress Protector - King
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tempur-Pedic
Type: Mattress Protector
Price: 129.99

Introducing the new TEMPUR-FIT™ Protector featuring a soft touch sleeping surface for maximum comfort and breathability. Stretchable fabric provides closer contact with TEMPUR® material, allowing for better adaptability to the mattress. A triple-layer polyurethane coating ensures a 100% waterproof sleep surface for unwavering reliability and Aegis® antimicrobials that prevent bacterial growth, odour, staining, and dust mites.

PROMOTES A HYGIENIC SLEEP ENVIRONMENT

  • Aegis® is an anti-bacteria, anti-dust, and anti-mould treatment that can resist many washes
  • Triple layer polyurethane coating incorporated with Aegis treatment provides perfect shield against dust mites
  • Washable up to 60º C

100% WATERPROOF SLEEPING SURFACE

  • Triple layer coating ensures 100% waterproof sleep surface, even after intensive use and washing
  • Comfortable jersey breathable sleeping surface provides superior absorption and comfort. Quiet to sleep on.

DESIGNED FOR TEMPUR-PEDIC MATTRESSES

  • Deep pockets fit mattresses up to 18" thick on all sizes.

GUARANTEED PROTECTION

  • Protect your mattress investment with mattress replacement for 10 years

entry.title: Ice Silk Mattress Protector - Twin
entry.summary:
Vendor: RiseSleep Accessories
Type: Mattress Protector
Price: 129.99

Icesilk
This amazing fabric is made possible by a strategic weaving of advanced cooling nylon fibres into the surface of this protector. These cooling fibres increased capacity to absorb heat is essential to its ability to help balance the temperature of your mattress during the night.

Non-slip Elastic 
The elastic on this mattress protector is 4-5 times thicker and stronger than the standard elastic found on most protectors. No more having to deal with slipped-off corners!

Fit & Finish 
This will be the best fitting mattress protector you have ever had! The entire protector is designed to fit your mattress 
like a glove, no more bunching under the sheets. 

Water Proof & Breathable
Accidents happen! That is why our protectors have a water proof barrier built in to protect your mattress.

5-Sided
The sides of the Icesilk protector are also waterproofed for extra protection against accidents!

entry.title: Tencel Mattress Protector - Twin XL
entry.summary:
Vendor: RiseSleep Accessories
Type: Mattress Protector
Price: 69.99

Tencel
These fibers are sustainably crafted from raw wood pulp and are known for their long-lasting, super soft feel. They are also known for their ability to reduce bacterial growth!

Design
The Tencel Protector was designed to be invisible when put on your mattress. We don't want to take away from the incredible feel of your new mattress!

Non-slip elastic
The elastic on this mattress protector is 4-5 times thicker and stronger than the standard elastic found on most protectors. No more having to deal with slipped-off corners!

Water Proof & Breathable
Accidents happen! That is why our protectors have a water proof barrier built in to protect your mattress.

Fit & Finish

like a glove, no more bunching under the sheets.
